"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"行为准则\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"前言\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"谁必须遵循本准则？\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"所有员工、高管和董事会成员均应了解并遵守本准则。EPAM 也希望所有承包商、供应商及其他业务伙伴与我公司合作过程中亦遵守本准则。违背本准则可能导致惩戒措施或关系终止。惩戒措施亦适用于纵容、许可违法、不道德或其他不当行为，或未能对此类行为采取适当的预防、纠正或其他措施的管理人员或高管。如果您认为某项行为违反了本准则，或可能对 EPAM 产生危害，则应告知 EPAM。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"谁可以帮助我解答疑问或提出疑虑？\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"您可通过多个途径提出疑虑：\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"联系您的经理；\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"向本公司合规专员，财务副总裁 Anthony Conte 提出；\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"通过 EPAM 热线（内线：x58888 或外线：1-267-685-6741）匿名提出；或\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"将用电子邮件发送至 \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:confidential@epacom\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"confidential@epacom\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"。\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"在相关法律和 EPAM 调查所需的范围内，EPAM 将合理保护您的秘密。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"如果我报告了可能的违规行为，会发生什么？\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 将立即调查所报告的违规情况，并采取适当的纠正和/或惩戒措施。EPAM 不允许对善意报告任何已知、涉嫌或可能的违规行为，或善意配合任何调查的任何员工采取报复行为。任何参与报复行为的人均将受到惩戒，包括解雇处理。如果您认为您因举报违规或配合相关调查而受到报复，请联系合规专员或拨打 EPAM 热线。\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"哪里可以找到本准则的副本？\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"本准则可能不时修改，副本可在下列地方找到：\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://pal.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM 过程资源库
